sql-statements.statement: delete from role_permission where org_internal_id = ? and role_name_id = ? and permission_name = ?

select B.role_name, B.role_name_id, A.permission_name, A.role_activity_id, C.caption as role_activity_name, A.org_internal_id from role_permission A, role_name B, role_activity C where A.org_internal_id = ? and A.role_name_id = B.role_name_id and A.role_activity_id = C.id order by B.role_name, A.permission_name
select role_name_id, role_name from Role_Name where role_status_id = 0

select B.role_name, B.role_name_id, A.permission_name, A.role_activity_id, C.caption as role_activity_name, A.org_internal_id from role_permission A, role_name B, role_activity C where A.org_internal_id = ? and A.role_name_id = ? and A.permission_name = ? and A.role_activity_id = C.id and A.role_name_id = B.role_name_id
